```{r}

library(tsDyn)
library(tidyverse)
library(vars)
library(lubridate)
data <- read.csv("cryptosup.csv")


```



```{r}
vecm.jo<-VECM(data[,2:5], lag=5, estim="ML",r=3)

summary(vecm.jo)
```

```{r}
pred<-predict_rolling(vecm.jo, nroll = 10, n.ahead = 1)

predi <- predict(vecm.jo, n.ahead = 10)
```


```{r}
ggplot()+geom_line(aes(x=as.Date(data[221:230,1]),y=pred$pred[,1],group=1),color="red")+geom_line(data =data,aes(x=as.Date(Date),y=Bitcoin,group=1))
```


```{r}
ggplot()+geom_line(aes(x=as.Date(data[221:230,1]),y=pred$pred[,2],group=1),color="cyan")+geom_line(data =data,aes(x=as.Date(Date),y=Cardano,group=1))
```

```{r}
dates <- as.Date(data[,1])
predidates<-1:10

predidates[1] <- dates[230]
for (i in 2:11) {
  predidates[i]<-dates[230]+weeks(i)
}

predibtc <- c(data[230,2],predi[,1])

```






```{r}
ggplot()+geom_line(data =data[150:230,],aes(x=as.Date(Date),y=Bitcoin,group=1))+geom_line(aes(x=as.Date(predidates),y=predibtc),color="red")+labs(y="Price", x="Date",title = "Bitcoin")+scale_x_date(date_labels = "%m-%Y",breaks = scales::pretty_breaks(n = 15))



```
